data.text:
Friedrich Karl Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck1

M, #109321, b. 20 August 1757, d. 25 March 1816

Last Edited=1 May 2005

Consanguinity Index=8.04%

Friedrich Karl Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck was born on 20 August 1757.2 He was the son of Karl Anton August Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck and Friederike Gräfin von Dohna-Schlobitten-Leistenau.1,3 He married Friederike Amalie Gräfin von Schlieben, daughter of Karl Leopold Graf von Schlieben and Marie Eleanore Gräfin von Lehndorff, on 9 March 1780.3 He died on 25 March 1816 at age 58 at Wellingsbuttel .2

He gained the title of Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck.3

Children of Friedrich Karl Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck and Friederike Amalie Gräfin von Schlieben

Friederike Prinzessin zu Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg b. 13 Dec 1780, d. 19 Jan 1862

Luise Prinzessin von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck b. 28 Sep 1783, d. 24 Nov 1803

Frederik Wilhelm Paul Leopold Herzog zu Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg+1 b. 4 Jan 1785, d. 27 Feb 1831

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 156. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Frederik Wilhelm Paul Leopold Herzog zu Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg1

M, #109322, b. 4 January 1785, d. 27 February 1831

Last Edited=22 Feb 2007

Frederik Wilhelm Paul Leopold Herzog zu Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg was born on 4 January 1785 at Lindenau, Königsberg, Prussia, Russia .2,3 He was the son of Friedrich Karl Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck and Friederike Amalie Gräfin von Schlieben.1,4 He married Luise Karoline Prinzessin von Hessen-Kassel, daughter of Karl Landgraf von Hessen-Kassel and Louise Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark, on 28 January 1810 at Gottorp .2 He died on 27 February 1831 at age 46 at Gottorp .2

He gained the title of Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck in 1816. He gained the rank of Major-General in the Danish Army.3 He gained the title of Herzog zu Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg in 1825.2

Children of Frederik Wilhelm Paul Leopold Herzog zu Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Glücksburg and Luise Karoline Prinzessin von Hessen-Kassel

Johann Adolf Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp1

M, #109323, b. 27 February 1575, d. 31 March 1616

Last Edited=2 May 2004

Consanguinity Index=2.6%

Johann Adolf Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp was born on 27 February 1575. He was the son of Adolf Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp and Christine von Hessen.1,2 He married Augusta Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark, daughter of Frederik II Oldenburg, King of Denmark and Sophia von Mecklenburg-Güstrow, on 30 August 1596 at Copenhagen, Denmark . He died on 31 March 1616 at age 41.

He gained the title of Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp.2

Children of Johann Adolf Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp and Augusta Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark

Christian August Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp1

M, #109324, b. 11 January 1673, d. 1726

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=5.17%

Christian August Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp was born on 11 January 1673. He was the son of Christian Albrecht Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp and Frederica Amalie Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark.2 He married Albertine Markgräfin von Baden-Durlach, daughter of Friedrich VII Magnus Markgraf von Baden-Durlach and Auguste Marie Prinzessin von Holstein-Gottorp, on 2 September 1704. He died in 1726.2

He gained the title of Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp.2 He held the office of Bishop of Lubeck.

Christian Albrecht Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp1

M, #109325, b. 3 February 1641, d. 6 January 1695

Last Edited=2 May 2004

Consanguinity Index=3.51%

Christian Albrecht Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp was born on 3 February 1641. He was the son of Friedrich III Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp and Marie Elisabeth Herzogin von Sachsen.2 He married Frederica Amalie Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark, daughter of Frederik III Oldenburg, King of Denmark and Sophie Amelie Prinzessin von Braunschweig-Lüneburg, on 24 October 1667. He died on 6 January 1695 at age 53.

He gained the title of Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp. He held the office of Bishop of Lubeck between 1655 and 1666.

Children of Christian Albrecht Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp and Frederica Amalie Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark

Sophie Amalia von Holstein-Gottorp b. 19 Jan 1670, d. 27 Feb 1710

Christian August Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp+3 b. 11 Jan 1673, d. 1726

Friedrich IV von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp1

M, #109326, b. 18 October 1671, d. 19 July 1702

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=5.17%

Friedrich IV von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp was born on 18 October 1671. He was the son of Christian Albrecht Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp and Frederica Amalie Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark.1,2 He married Hedwig Sophie von Holstein-Gottorp, daughter of Carl XI von Holstein-Gottorp, King of Sweden and Ulrike Eleanore Oldenburg, Princess of Denmark, on 12 June 1698 at Carlberg . He died on 19 July 1702 at age 30 at Klisson, Poland , killed.

He gained the title of Duke of Holstein-Gottorp.3

Child of Friedrich IV von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp and Hedwig Sophie von Holstein-Gottorp

Karl Friedrich von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp+1 b. 30 Apr 1700, d. 18 Jun 1739

Karl Friedrich von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp1

M, #109327, b. 30 April 1700, d. 18 June 1739

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=13.62%

Karl Friedrich von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp was born on 30 April 1700 at Stockholm, Sweden . He was the son of Friedrich IV von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp and Hedwig Sophie von Holstein-Gottorp.1 He married Anna Petrovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia, daughter of Petr I 'the Great' Alexeiovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Ekaterina I Skavronska, Tsarina of Russia, on 1 June 1725 at St. Petersburg, Russia . He died on 18 June 1739 at age 39 at Rolfshagen, Germany .

He gained the title of Duke of Holstein-Gottorp.

Child of Karl Friedrich von Holstein-Gottorp, Duke of Holstein-Gottorp and Anna Petrovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia

Petr III Romanov, Tsar of Russia+ b. 21 Feb 1728, d. 17 Jul 1762

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 156. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Karl XIII von Holstein-Gottorp, King of Sweden1

M, #109328, b. 7 October 1748, d. 5 February 1818

Last Edited=3 Dec 2008

Consanguinity Index=3.72%

Karl XIII von Holstein-Gottorp, King of Sweden was born on 7 October 1748 at Stockholm, Sweden .2 He was the son of Adolf Frederik I von Holstein-Gottorp, King of Sweden and Luise Ulrike Prinzessin von Preußen.1 He married Hedwige Elisabeth Charlotte Oldenburg, Princess of Oldenburg, daughter of Friedrich August Oldenburg, Grand Duke of Oldenburg and Ulrike Friederike Wilhelmine Prinzessin von Hessen-Kassel, on 7 July 1774 at Stockholm, Sweden .1 He died on 5 February 1818 at age 69 at Stockholm, Sweden .2

He gained the title of Prince Carl of Sweden.2 He held the office of Regent of Sweden between 29 March 1792 and 6 June 1809.2 He and Hedwige Elisabeth Charlotte Oldenburg, Princess of Oldenburg were adopted. He succeeded as the King Karl XIII of Sweden on 6 June 1809.2 He succeeded as the King Karl XIII of Norway in 1814.3

Children of Karl XIII von Holstein-Gottorp, King of Sweden and Hedwige Elisabeth Charlotte Oldenburg, Princess of Oldenburg

unnamed daughter von Holstein-Gottorp2 b. 2 Jul 1797, d. 2 Jul 1797

Carl Adolf von Holstein-Gottorp, Prince of Sweden2 b. 4 Jul 1798, d. 10 Jul 1798

Citations

Georg Ludwig Prinz von Holstein-Gottorp1

M, #109329, b. 16 March 1719, d. 7 September 1763

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=9.14%

Georg Ludwig Prinz von Holstein-Gottorp was born on 16 March 1719. He was the son of Christian August Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp and Albertine Markgräfin von Baden-Durlach.2,3 He married Sophie Charlotte von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck, daughter of Friedrich Wilhelm II Herzog von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck and Ursula Anna von Dohna-Schlodien-Carwinden, on 1 January 1750. He died on 7 September 1763 at age 44. He was also reported to have died in 1761.2

He gained the title of Herzog von Holstein-Gottorp. He gained the title of Prinz von Holstein-Gottorp.1

Children of Georg Ludwig Prinz von Holstein-Gottorp and Sophie Charlotte von Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck

Friedrich von Holstein-Gottorp b. 20 Jul 1751, d. 10 Aug 1752

Wilhelm von Holstein-Gottorp b. 18 Jan 1753, d. 14 Jul 1774

Peter I Friedrich Ludwig von Holstein-Gottorp, Grand Duke of Oldenburg+2 b. 17 Jan 1755, d. 21 May 1829
